Title: Change of Course
Plot: Edwin Poole escapes from the psychiatric hospital and gets a criminal case where a man is tried for murdering a police officer and Lori is forced to help him.  Alan defends one of the firm's biggest clients after she is caught stealing a scarf.  Alan asks Sally to perform an unprincipled task that can help win his case but also destroy their relationship.
GuestStars: Will Radford,  Larry Miller,  David Kaufman,  Kevin R. Kelly,  Jeremiah Birkett,  Robert Joy,  Richard Portnow,  David Norona,  Anita Finlay,  Thomas Kopache,  Linda Gehringer,  Jim Kratt,  Craig Mitchell,  Louis
